pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
pre_caption: This is a scenery shot of a vibrant, rural landscape on a sunny day. The view is across lush green fields, with a dense line of trees to the right and a small village in the distance. The camera is moving forward at high speed, creating a significant motion blur effect.
